message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $12,000, which reflects the true value of this item. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is cutting it too close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?  I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I believe we can still reach a fair compromise. I am willing to pay $10,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
